info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 7:03PM EDT until June 27 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Southwestern Cherokee County in Upstate South Carolina... Northwestern Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 703 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Gaffney, or over Cowpens, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Pacolet, Cowpens, Mayo, Jonesville, Pacolet Mills, Croft State Park, Cedar Springs, Thicketty, Pauline and Buffalo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
